data.title: Mammootty Who has honoured with Padma Shri, three National Film Awards
data.meta_description: Today is the birthday of Muhammad Kutty Panparambil Ismail, who has shown his powerful roleÂ in Malayalam films. People know Muhammad Kutty P... | News Track
data.text:
Today is the birthday of Muhammad Kutty Panparambil Ismail, who has shown his powerful role in Malayalam films. People know Muhammad Kutty Panparanbil Ismail as Mammootty. However, today, 7th September, Mammootty is celebrating his 70th birthday. Mammootty is a very good film actor and producer. He has worked mainly in Malayalam films. In her career spanning four decades, Mammootty has acted in more than 400 films. You must have seen him in Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi and English films. Mammootty was born in Chempu village of Vaikom in Kottayam district of Kerala and grew up.

He has won three National Film Awards for Best Actor and seven Kerala State Film Awards. He has also been honoured with the Thirteen Filmfare Awards South. In 1998, Mammootty was also awarded the Padma Shri by the Government of India for his contribution to art. Very few people know that Mammootty also received an honorary doctorate from Kerala University in January 2010 and from Calicut University in December 2010.

He is the president of Malayalam Communications, which airs Malayalam television channels Carali TV, People TV and V TV. At the same time, Mammootty is the Goodwill Ambassador of the Akshaya Project, the first district-wide e-literacy project in India. Talking about Mammootty's personal life, he married Sulfath in 1979 and has a daughter Surumi and a son Dulkar Salman. Happy Birthday to Mammootty on our behalf today.
